question: 1.	You and your brother have decided to go for a holiday but due to some reason, your brother is not able to join you for holiday. Write a letter to your friend to invite him/her for holiday. Give detail plan of vacation. State reason why your brother will not come with you. Invite your friend.
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health and the best of spirits. How is your work going? I am writing this letter to invite you for a holiday that is planned for the first week of the next month.
Due to some unforeseen circumstances, my brother who was planned to accompany me will not be able to join me during the holiday. An unplanned visit of his client entails him to stay back.

I have booked two tickets to Malaysia and Singapore. There are lots of sightseeing locations as well as various amusement parks, which we would cover in our tour plan. I have also booked for a skilled tourist guide, which will add more to our journey. He will be taking us to all the prominent tourist locations.

My joy will know no bounds, if you accept this invitation. I am sure that you will be accompanying me, as I know this is one of your favourite tourist spots. It has been long, seeing you and I assure you that, this journey will rejuvenate your mind. Anticipating for a positive response from your side!
